instructions: Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 1 1 Open the Facebook app. It's a white "F" on a blue background. If you aren't signed into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password and tap Log In . Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 2 2 Tap . It's in the bottom right corner of the screen. Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 3 3 Scroll down and tap . It's at the bottom of the first list of options here. Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 4 4 Tap . Doing so opens the Memories page. Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 5 5 Scroll down through your memories. Facebook will display several different statuses, pictures, and other media from today's date for past years. You'll also see a section at the bottom of the page dedicated to days previous to today's date. Advertisement

Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 11 1 Open the Facebook website . Doing so will open your News Feed if you're already logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged into Facebook, type in your email address (or phone number) and password in the top right corner of the page and click Log In . Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 12 2 Click under the "Explore" tab. The Explore tab is on the left side of your News Feed. Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 13 3 Click . The "On This Day" app is what creates the "Memories" posts you see in your News Feed. Image titled See Memories on Facebook Step 14 4 Scroll down through your memories. You'll see different statuses, pictures, and other posts from today's date for past years. You'll also see a section at the bottom of the page dedicated to days previous to today's date.
